body_html:
Thanks Max! Interesting questions. Anika asked for " a page like this, with only the selected projects: teams.railsgirlssummerofcode.org/projects, " for sponsors to see the projects and technologies.
I thought that that page showed too much information. But maybe it is not? I'll check with Anika.

Also, AFAIK it is not that urgent that it can't wait until Monday. I'll work on the improvements in the meantime. 💪

body:
Thanks Max! Interesting questions. Anika asked for " a page like this, with only the selected projects: [teams.railsgirlssummerofcode.org/projects](https://teams.railsgirlssummerofcode.org/projects), " for sponsors to see the projects and technologies.
I thought that that page showed too much information. But maybe it is not? I'll check with Anika.
 
Also, AFAIK it is not that urgent that it can't wait until Monday. I'll work on the improvements in the meantime. 💪
